channel.title: Npc drop's dont show plz help
channel.description:
So im using rune-fusion server PI source and i cant change npc drops :( Evrythink what i need is change npc id it npc drops.tsm but here i got error
i know in PI source all npc drop is it npcdrops.tsm but.... [url=http://h.imagehost.org/download/0597/help1][img]http://h.imagehost.org/0597/help1.jpg[/img][/url]
and here error comes then i change npc id
[url=http://h.imagehost.org/download/0322/Picture][img]http://h.imagehost.org/0322/Picture.jpg[/img][/url]
also i tryed dont tuch old npc drop and add new drops but.... npc's didnt drop.......
NEVERmind guys after week i fixed it my self lol problem was
Nvm guys evrythink what i needed go to src\server\model\npcs\npcdrops.java
public void loadDrops() { try { int[][][] npcDrops = new int [3800][][]; //it was max npc id int[][][] rareDrops2 = new int [3800][][];//so then i changed to int[] itemRarity = new int [3800];//6300 it loaded no problems File f = new File("./Data/cfg/NPCDrops.TSM");

item.title: Npc drop's dont show plz help
item.dc:creator: @crazyfazespy crazyfazespy
item.description:
@crazyfazespy wrote:

So im using rune-fusion server PI source and i cant change npc drops
Evrythink what i need is change npc id it npc drops.tsm but here i got error

i know in PI source all npc drop is it npcdrops.tsm but…

and here error comes then i change npc id

also i tryed dont tuch old npc drop and add new drops but… npc’s didnt drop…

           NEVERmind guys after week i fixed it my self lol problem was

Nvm guys evrythink what i needed go to src\server\model\npcs\npcdrops.java

public void loadDrops() {
try {
int[][][] npcDrops = new int [3800][][]; //it was max npc id
int[][][] rareDrops2 = new int [3800][][];//so then i changed to
int[] itemRarity = new int [3800];//6300 it loaded no problems
File f = new File("./Data/cfg/NPCDrops.TSM");

Read full topic
item.source: Npc drop's dont show plz help
